title: DNA Says Love You
overview: Inseparable childhood friends Pu Le Jian, Zhuang Xi Wen, and Xie Yu He swore they'd be together forever, but fate forced Le Jian and Xi Wen to part. Years later, Le Jian is struggling to keep his adventure YouTube channel going when a mysterious figure named Amber appears out of nowhere, claiming to be a fan of his, and offers him information on a place called Guilai Abbey.
